---
title: "Quarto Website"
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library("tidyverse")
# Load your dataset
clean_data <- read.csv("clean_data.csv")  # Replace "your_dataset.csv" with your actual file path

# Filter the data for "Secondary" qualification and year 2022
filtered_data <- clean_data %>% 
  filter(Data.Series == "Secondary" & 2022)

# Create a bar plot to compare marital status
ggplot(data = filtered_data, aes(x = "Secondary", y = 2022)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "blue") +
  labs(title = "Marital Status for Secondary Education in 2022",
       x = "Marital Status",
       y = "Percentage")

```
